txt.en: 'Incantation stones usually have some sort of incantation or written spell inscribed on their surface in runic form. When read aloud, these incantations can have incredible effects! Based on my translation of the runes on these incantation stones, these appear to have been created to ward off the Dead. Unfortunately, like the runed plaques, only someone trained in the lore of runes such as a lore-master, rune-keeper, or minstrel can possibly read these incantations....'
